title: Prelude in C Major, BWV 846 (Well-Tempered Clavier)

musicalLanguage.description: The piece that opens Bach's monumental Well-Tempered Clavier — a flowing sequence of arpeggiated chords that journey through a rich harmonic landscape.
keyMoments: Opening: the iconic C major arpeggio pattern
Final cadence: resolution back to C major
styleTips: Perfectly even rhythm — each note equal weight
Let the harmonic changes speak for themselves
Minimal rubato — the flow is the beauty
